author: Zephyrkul (Zephyrkul#1089)
install_msg:
Both FFmpeg and ffprobe must be installed and in your system's PATH for this cog to work. I do not offer support for setting up either.
âš  This cog downloads and processes videos in order to analyze whether they are malicious or not, and thus uses a lot of resources, especially memory. Unload this cog if you do not consent to this.
This cog has no commands. Use the core `[p]autoimmune` command to configure who is immune to this cog, and core ModLog's `[p]modlogset` command to configure this cog's logging.
name: AntiCrashVid
short: Automatically delete and log malicious videos that attempt to crash Discord clients.
description: Automatically delete and log malicious videos that attempt to crash Discord clients.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store any data or metadata about users.
